title: As a BOC User, I want MJC the Adjusted Earned bonus amounts to be editable at all times
custom_preconds: BOC users will be able to edit the adjusted earned bonus amounts at any time (provided the bonus is earned) rather than only when the override salary adjustment checkbox is checked.  The value will ONLY be calculated when it is not filled in: the first time the bonus is earned or when the user clears it and saves the contract.AC:* Adjusted Earned Bonus is editable by BOC users once the bonus is earned* The system calculates Adjusted Earned Bonus only when it has not already been calculated

title: As a User, I want to see the Adjusted Threshold values for Performance and Other Bonuses
custom_preconds: Performance and Other bonus's terms will display an 'Adjusted Threshold' next to the actual entered threshold.  This includes ALL year bonuses and any with threshold tables.  The value will be calculated only the first time and once it is calculated it will no longer be changed by the system.  BOC users can modify the value at any time and their updates will be preserved.  AC:When there is a games adjustment in the the year the value originally calculated will follow the following logic:* For non innings pitched thresholds, apply the games divisor to the threshold total and then always rounded up to the next integer.  Example: 10 Games Played * 60 / 162 = ~3.7 Games Played -> New threshold is rounded up to 4 Games played * For innings pitched thresholds, convert the innings pitched to outs, apply the games divisor to the outs and round up to the nearest integer.  Then convert that back into innings pitched.  Example: 10 IP = 30 outs, 30 * .37 = ~11.1, 11.1 rounds up to 12, 12/3 = 4, so show 4.0 innings pitched.  Note that innings pitched could come out to 1.1, 1.2, 2.0, 2.1, etc* For multi year bonus terms that include an adjusted year (2020) and any terms that do not include an adjusted year, the adjusted threshold will remain the original threshold value* The value will only be calculated once and then once it has been set will no longer be updated even if the games values change.  * The user can change the value as necessary and the system will not recalculate it* Clearing the value will cause the system to recalculate it and set the appropriate value* The MJ Stat batch will use the adjusted thresholds when checking to see if a bonus is earned* For multi year bonuses that included an adjusted year, the MJ Stat batch will continue to prorate the adjusted year's stats portion.  For all other bonus terms it will NOT prorate the value

title: As a User, I want to see Adjusted MN Compensation on major league contracts
custom_preconds: There should be an additional column next to each salary value displaying the adjusted amount.  This should work the same as MJ comp.The values should be adjusted using the same calculation as regular salary (currently the value * 60 / 162).  BOC users will be able to change this value if the override salary adjustment check box is checked.AC:* There will be new Adj. columns in the MN compensation rows on a major contract* The value at each level will be the adjusted amount of the actual salary* The values will be editable for BOC users when the contract has the override salary adjusted check box checked.

title: As a User, I want a Flag to Identify Players included in a Club Player Pool
custom_preconds: AC:* There will be a new DB flag created that will be used to identify players included in an Club's Player Pool* Definition of players who count towards Player Pool:** (Total # of Active Roster Players + Total # of Alternate Training Site Players) - (Total # of 60-Day IL Rehab Players)

title: FIX Logic Update Intl Verification Email
custom_preconds: There is an email that is sent to intl amateur players upon verification.  The dates/period logic in the email is hard coded, so emails going out after the system dates were changed are now incorrect.AC: - Update the email template to remove the placeholder and set it to 2020-21 for the year - Set the Eligible to Sign Date to 1/15/2021 - The email that gets sent out will now reflect accurate signing periods and ETSDs

title: As a BOC Admin User, I want to edit the Club Player Pool Utility
custom_preconds: Wire:https://b6mbog.axshare.com/#p=club_player_poolsData Discovery:https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/597196852/Data+Discovery+-+Club+Player+Pools+UtilityAC: - Users with the ebis-widget-clubplayerpool-editor role will see an edit button when viewing the Club Player Pools Utility - Clicking Edit will reload the form in edit mode - The only editable field will be the Replacement checkbox in the Alternate Training Site table - When the form is in edit mode, there will be a save button - Clicking Save will prompt the user to confirm their action  -- If the user confirms, the form will be reloaded into edit mode and any changes will be committed  -- If the user does not confirm, the modal will be dismissed and the user will be returned to the form in edit mode - There will also be a Cancel button when the form is in edit mode - Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action  -- If the user confirms, the form will be reloaded into view mode and any changes will be dismissed  -- If the user does not confirm, the modal will be dismissed and the user will be returned to the form in edit mode

title: PERMISSIONS: Club Player Pool Utility
custom_preconds: The following permission groups will be created:* ebis-widget-clubplayerpools-editor* ebis-widget-clubplayerpools-viewer*ebis-widget-clubplayerpools-editor* will be added to the following roles:*  ebis-proplayer-boc-admin-role*ebis-widget-clubplayerpools-viewer* will be added to the following roles:*  ebis-proplayer-boc-viewer-role*  ebis-proplayer-club-admin-role*  ebis-proplayer-club-viewer-role

title: Update Intl Verification Email
custom_preconds: There is an email that is sent to intl amateur players upon verification.  The dates/period logic in the email is hard coded, so emails going out after the system dates were changed are now incorrect.AC: - Update the email template to remove the placeholder and set it to 2020-21 for the year - Set the Eligible to Sign Date to 1/15/2021 - The email that gets sent out will now reflect accurate signing periods and ETSDs

title: As a BOC MJ Trans Admin, I want to edit the Earliest Reinstatement Date on IL Placement Transactions
custom_preconds: AC:* When a BOC MJ Trans Admin is viewing one of the the following transactions in edit mode, Earliest Reinstatement Date will be editable** Place on 7-Day Concussion IL** Place on 10-Day IL** Place on 15-Day IL** Place on 60-Day IL (Major)** Place on 7-Day IL** Place on 60-Day IL (Minor)* Reinstatement Date may not be before Placement Date* Club users will never see this field as editable

title: As a User, I want to export the Club Player Pool to Excel
custom_preconds: AC:* There will be an export button on the Club Player Pool button* Clicking export will export all the players in the Pool to excel* All the columns will match the tables on the page* There will be a new PlayerID column added* There will be a new ‰Û÷Type‰Ûª column added with the following options:** Major League Active Roster** Alternate Training Site** 40-Man Players (Non-Club Player Pool)* There will be an Org column exported* Players from all three tables will appear in one large unbroken list* There will be an arrow on the Excel button* Clicking the arrow will reveal an Export All button* Clicking Export All will Export the Player Pools for all Orgs to Excel* Sort Order:** Org** Type** Player Name

title: As a User, I want to Print the Club Players Pools page
custom_preconds: AC:* There will be a Print button on the Club Players Pool page* Clicking the Print button will print a PDF version of the page* The PDF will be in landscape orientation* The PDF will look good

title: The MJC Override Adj Salary Calcs should be visible but not editable for club users
custom_preconds: The MJC Override adj salary calcs should be visible but not editable for club users.LRD is going to use this to indicate to clubs that there is something different about the contract from the standard calculation

title: INC0154939 - Signing Bonus Clause Not Appearing on UI
custom_preconds:
Please see the two screenshots below, along with the attached UPCs. The Mets signed both of these players and both contracts have signing bonuses included. However, the signing bonus does not appear in the terms submitted in EBIS. Iâ€™ve held off on accepting terms for the moment. 

Iâ€™ve tried logging out/clearing cache and cookies/restarting my browser, but the bonuses still do not appear in the Addendum B. Could you please take a look at this and let me know if thereâ€™s anything else I need to do to resolve this?
